languages.text: "Первые его следы были обнаружены нами сразу после прибытия в {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простор Коронус{/g}. С тех пор чем больше мы узнаем, тем лучше мы видим, насколько далеко эта зараза пустила корни. Уничтожение отдельных ячеек бессмысленно, пока мы не отрубим этому левиафану голову".

traits.locale_text: "Первые его следы были обнаружены нами сразу после прибытия в Простор Коронус. С тех пор чем больше мы узнаем, тем лучше мы видим, насколько далеко эта зараза пустила корни. Уничтожение отдельных ячеек бессмысленно, пока мы не отрубим этому левиафану голову".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "We discovered the first traces of it as soon as we arrived in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. Since then, the more we learn, the better we see just how far the roots of this blight extend. Destroying individual cells is pointless — we must cut this beast off at its head."
languages.original_text: "Первые его следы были обнаружены нами сразу после прибытия в {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простор Коронус{/g}. С тех пор чем больше мы узнаем, тем лучше мы видим, насколько далеко эта зараза пустила корни. Уничтожение отдельных ячеек бессмысленно, пока мы не отрубим этому левиафану голову".

traits.locale_text: "We discovered the first traces of it as soon as we arrived in the Koronus Expanse. Since then, the more we learn, the better we see just how far the roots of this blight extend. Destroying individual cells is pointless — we must cut this beast off at its head."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We discovered the first traces of it as soon as we arrived in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. Since then, the more we learn, the better we see just how far the roots of this blight extend. Destroying individual cells is pointless — we must cut this beast off at its head."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We discovered the first traces of it as soon as we arrived in the Koronus Expanse. Since then, the more we learn, the better we see just how far the roots of this blight extend. Destroying individual cells is pointless — we must cut this beast off at its head."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We discovered the first traces of it as soon as we arrived in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. Since then, the more we learn, the better we see just how far the roots of this blight extend. Destroying individual cells is pointless — we must cut this beast off at its head."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “我们刚刚抵达{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}，就已经发现了蛛丝马迹。从那个时候起，我们就开始了调查。我们了解得越多，就越是意识到腐化的侵蚀有多深。消灭单个细胞毫无意义，我们必须把这只怪物的头彻底斩断。”
languages.original_text: "We discovered the first traces of it as soon as we arrived in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. Since then, the more we learn, the better we see just how far the roots of this blight extend. Destroying individual cells is pointless — we must cut this beast off at its head."

traits.locale_text: “我们刚刚抵达{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}，就已经发现了蛛丝马迹。从那个时候起，我们就开始了调查。我们了解得越多，就越是意识到腐化的侵蚀有多深。消灭单个细胞毫无意义，我们必须把这只怪物的头彻底斩断。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "We discovered the first traces of it as soon as we arrived in the Koronus Expanse. Since then, the more we learn, the better we see just how far the roots of this blight extend. Destroying individual cells is pointless — we must cut this beast off at its head."

languages.text: «Descubrimos los primeros rastros en cuanto llegamos a la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}. Desde entonces, cuanto más sabemos, mejor comprendemos hasta dónde se extienden las raíces de esta podredumbre. Destruir a células aisladas es inútil; tenemos que decapitar a la bestia».
languages.original_text: "We discovered the first traces of it as soon as we arrived in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. Since then, the more we learn, the better we see just how far the roots of this blight extend. Destroying individual cells is pointless — we must cut this beast off at its head."

traits.locale_text: «Descubrimos los primeros rastros en cuanto llegamos a la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}. Desde entonces, cuanto más sabemos, mejor comprendemos hasta dónde se extienden las raíces de esta podredumbre. Destruir a células aisladas es inútil; tenemos que decapitar a la bestia».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}に到着してすぐに、その最初の痕跡を発見した。それ以来、知れば知るほど、この災いの根がどこまで伸びているかがわかってきた。個々の細胞を破壊することは無意味だ。この獣を頭から断ち切らなければならない」
languages.original_text: "We discovered the first traces of it as soon as we arrived in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. Since then, the more we learn, the better we see just how far the roots of this blight extend. Destroying individual cells is pointless — we must cut this beast off at its head."

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}に到着してすぐに、その最初の痕跡を発見した。それ以来、知れば知るほど、この災いの根がどこまで伸びているかがわかってきた。個々の細胞を破壊することは無意味だ。この獣を頭から断ち切らなければならない」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Wir haben die ersten Spuren unmittelbar nach unserer Ankunft in der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} entdeckt. Seitdem sammeln wir immer mehr Wissen und begreifen immer besser, wie weit die Wurzeln dieser Seuche reichen. Einzelne Zellen zu zerstören, ist zwecklos. Wir müssen dem Ungeheuer den Kopf abschlagen."
languages.original_text: "We discovered the first traces of it as soon as we arrived in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. Since then, the more we learn, the better we see just how far the roots of this blight extend. Destroying individual cells is pointless — we must cut this beast off at its head."

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben die ersten Spuren unmittelbar nach unserer Ankunft in der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} entdeckt. Seitdem sammeln wir immer mehr Wissen und begreifen immer besser, wie weit die Wurzeln dieser Seuche reichen. Einzelne Zellen zu zerstören, ist zwecklos. Wir müssen dem Ungeheuer den Kopf abschlagen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Nous en avons découvert les premières traces dès notre arrivée dans les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g} et depuis, nous essayons d'en apprendre un maximum pour pouvoir déterminer jusqu'où s'étend son influence. Détruire une cellule ne rimerait à rien. Non, nous devons couper la tête de ce serpent. »
languages.original_text: "We discovered the first traces of it as soon as we arrived in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. Since then, the more we learn, the better we see just how far the roots of this blight extend. Destroying individual cells is pointless — we must cut this beast off at its head."

traits.locale_text: « Nous en avons découvert les premières traces dès notre arrivée dans les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g} et depuis, nous essayons d'en apprendre un maximum pour pouvoir déterminer jusqu'où s'étend son influence. Détruire une cellule ne rimerait à rien. Non, nous devons couper la tête de ce serpent. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "İzlerine ilk {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği'ne{/g} geldiğimizde rastladık. O zamandan beri bu musibeti araştırıyoruz. Araştırdıkça da ne kadar derinlere kök saldığını görüyoruz. Dallarını koparmakla bir yere varılmaz... Bunu kökünden söküp atmak gerek."
languages.original_text: "We discovered the first traces of it as soon as we arrived in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. Since then, the more we learn, the better we see just how far the roots of this blight extend. Destroying individual cells is pointless — we must cut this beast off at its head."

traits.locale_text: "İlk izlerine {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği{/g}'ne gelişimizde rastladık. O zamandan beri bu musibeti araştırıyoruz. Araştırdıkça da ne kadar derinlere kök saldığını görüyoruz. Dallarını koparmakla bir yere varılmaz... Bunu kökünden söküp atmak gerek."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
